means: 犹太复国主义，犹太复国运动

sentence.Network_en: His virulent opposition to Zionism reassured the radicals.
sentence.Network_cn: 他以恶毒的语言反对犹太复国主义,这使激进分子放心.

sentence.Network_en: Zionism always stood for peaceful coexistence with other people native to the land.
sentence.Network_cn: 犹太复国主义一贯主张与原产于土地的其他人和平共处.

sentence.Network_en: The duality analysis reveals that Zionism is both favorable and derogative to the Israeli - Palestinian peace.
sentence.Network_cn: 犹太复国主义的两重性对以巴和平产生的影响也是双重的,利弊兼有.

PerfectNetExp.abs: 2010年5月5日 - 反犹浪潮和欧洲犹太人解放运动此生彼长,现代民族国家的理念与传统犹太家园的向往交织在一起,在欧洲离散的犹太人心中,燃起了犹太复国主义(Zionism)的烈火.

list.abs: 赫尔兹尔无疑地提出了划时代的号召，赢得了大多数生活在苦难中的犹太人所支持，他终于成为“锡安主义运动”(zionism movement)的 …

entry.tran: 犹太复国运动;犹太复国主义
entry.def: Zionism is a movement which was originally concerned with establishing a political and religious state in Palestine for Jewish people, and is now concerned with the development of Israel.

means.word_mean: 1. a policy for establishing and developing a national homeland for Jews in Palestine
2. a movement of world Jewry that arose late in the 19th century with the aim of creating a Jewish state in Palestine

auth_sentence.content: I thought of him as the samurai of Zionism.
auth_sentence.res_content: I thought of him as the samurai of Zionism.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: I thought of him as the samurai of Zionism.

auth_sentence.content: For many, Zionism was now imbued with eschatological significance.
auth_sentence.res_content: For many, Zionism was now imbued with eschatological significance.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: For many, Zionism was now imbued with eschatological significance.

auth_sentence.content: Part of it was probably ideology, neo-Zionism.
auth_sentence.res_content: Part of it was probably ideology, neo-Zionism.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Part of it was probably ideology, neo-Zionism.
